game.name: Orangino
game.shortDescription: Orangino is a top-down roguelike shooter where you play a heroic orange on a mission to rescue his kidnapped love from a horde of mischievous vegetables. Equip a wild mix of medieval, modern, and magical weapons, and upgrade your skills to survive chaotic waves of enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Orangino is a top-down roguelike shooter where you play a heroic orange on a mission to rescue his kidnapped love from a horde of mischievous vegetables. Equip a wild mix of medieval, modern, and magical weapons, and upgrade your skills to survive chaotic waves of enemies.
